articles.title: Congratulations to Prime Minister of Guinea-Bissau
articles.content:
Congratulations to Prime Minister of Guinea-Bissau
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Friday sent a congratulatory message to Baciro Dja upon his appointment as prime minister of Guinea-Bissau.
					 The message expressed belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger and wished the prime minister success in his work for the country's stability and development.

articles.title: Reception Given by Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation in DPRK
articles.content:
Reception Given by Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Thomas Fisler, country director of the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation in the DPRK, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Friday on the national day of Switzerland.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Law on Sex Equality
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Law on Sex Equality
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- There took place a national meeting at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday on the 70th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's promulgation of the Law on Sex Equality.
					 The President promulgated "the north Korean law on sex equality" on July 30, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 The law prescribes that the women have the same rights as the men in all fabrics of social life including political, labor, educational and cultural life, marriage and family life and can participate in those activities freely.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop and Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the C.C., the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, women officials of the ministries and national institutions and women officials, heroes, persons who had the honor of being received by the great leaders and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 A report was made by Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He said the law, which the President personally wrote and promulgated, is a Juche-based programme for liberating women and a militant programme of the women's movement without an equal in the world.
					
					 The promulgation of the law helped the Korean women to dynamically push one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot with the equal rights with the men as proud mistresses of the society, the reporter said, and continued:
					
					 The President granted the Korean women the true rights to live through the promulgation of the law and saw to it that the social emancipation of women was successfully realized.
					
					 The course of accomplishing the Juche cause of emancipation of the women is associated with the undying feats of Kang Pan Sok, outstanding leader of the Korean women's movement, and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il firmly defended and glorified the President's idea on settling the issue of the women and his leadership exploits and trained the Korean women as the true women revolutionaries in the Songun era.
					
					 The history of love and trust the great leaders showed in training the women to be powerful forces is being carried forward generation after generation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There are many countries and nations in the world but there are no such blessed women who have fully enjoyed a worthy life for generations with rights and dignity as proud mistresses of the country as the Korean women.
					
					 The reporter called upon all women to hold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the eternal leaders of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people and the sun of Juche in high esteem and firmly defend and glorify forever the undying feats the great leaders who devoted themselves to independent dignity and rights and worthwhile life of the women.

articles.title: Overseas Side Preparatory Committee for Joint Conference for Peace and Independent Reunification Formed
articles.content:
Overseas Side Preparatory Committee for Joint Conference for Peace and Independent Reunification Formed
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The overseas side preparatory committee for the joint conference of political parties, organizations and individual personages of the north, the south and abroad for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula was formed on July 27, according to a notice of the north side preparatory committee for the joint conference on July 29.
					 The overseas side preparatory committee groups overseas regional preparatory committees.
					
					 It decided to expand the preparatory committee by steadily accepting organizations and personages hoping for taking part in the joint conference in the future.
					
					 In an inaugural declaration it said that the proposal for the joint conference is a very positive and realistic one for improving the frozen north-south relations and opening up a fresh phase for independent reunification, expressing the will to make positive efforts to successfully hold the great national conference.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Oceanian regional preparatory committee for the joint conference was formed on July 24.

articles.title: Protection of Disabled Persons Encouraged in DPRK
articles.content:
Protection of Disabled Persons Encouraged in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 18th founding anniversary of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled.
					 In this regard, Jong Hyon, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the federation, told KCNA:
					
					 Great efforts have been directed to respecting the personality of persons with disabilities, guaranteeing their socio-political rights and interests by law and thus letting them lead a happy life.
					
					 Thanks to the policy of loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea for the people and socialist system in the DPRK, a steady progress has been made in strengthening the material and technical foundations for the protection of the disabled as the days go by.
					
					 Recently, the contents of education were improved at schools for the disabled to make them acquire professional skills. And art group activities are put on a regular basis at those schools, including Taedong Blind School and Songchon Deaf School.
					
					 Meanwhile, the protection of the disabled has been called for through media and website "Huimang (hope)" was opened.
					
					 The disabled players of the DPRK have proved successful at the 14th Paralympic Games and other international para games.
					
					 Now, the federation closely cooperates with international bodies and diplomatic missions to the DPRK.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Jonsung Cup Ends
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Jonsung Cup Ends
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for Jonsung Cup came to an end in the DPRK on July 27. 
					 During the contest, players competed in eight events in Pyongyang, Wonsan and other parts of the country. 
					
					 The Sports Team under the Ministry of Land and Marine Transport won 52 gold medals in separate events like rowing, canoe and yacht races and water skiing, topping the team standings.
					
					 The April 25 Sports Team proved successful in swimming and diving events, while the Sports Team of the Ministry of Fisheries and the Hwaebul Sports Team in water polo and synchronized swimming events respectively.

articles.title: Extracurricular Centers for Schoolchildren
articles.content:
Extracurricular Centers for Schoolchildren
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren in the DPRK are spending the summer vacation at extracurricular centers built in scenic spots of the country.
					 They are enjoying boating, sea bathing, mountaineering, etc. at different centers like the Songdowon International Children's Camp and Nampho and Sohungho children's camps.
					
					 Meanwhile, schoolchildren's palaces, children's halls and juvenile sports schools also become animated these days.
					
					 Jang Chol, president of the February 16 Schoolchildren's Palace, told KCNA that children of working people in Tokchon City are cultivating their talents to their hearts' content at the palace and it instills great pleasure and optimism into its citizens.
					
					 The same is true of other palaces and halls across the country, including the Phyongsong Schoolchildren's Palace in South Phyongan Province and the Sapho District Schoolchildren's Hall in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province.

articles.title: Trade Union Officials Tour Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Trade Union Officials Tour Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Officials and primary information officials of the trade unions toured the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu from July 20 to 28 on the 63rd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung at the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo, Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site, Chongbong Bivouac, Monument to the Victorious Battle in the Musan Area and at the shore of Lake Samji and before the mosaic depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu at leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp before paying tribute to them.
					
					 At Pochonbo they went round the then command post of the Battle of Pochonbo, police sub-station and subcounty office.
					
					 At Chongbong Bivouac they looked round revolutionary historical relics associated with the traces left by Kim Il Sung on his way to the homeland.
					
					 While going round the groups of subsidiary theme sculptures at the Samjiyon Grand Monument and revolutionary historical relics at the shore of Lake Samji against the background of Mt. Paektu, they learned about revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung and the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners' spirit of devotedly defending the leader and patriotism.
					
					 They also visited the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station and toured the revolutionary battle site in Sinsadong and the Monument to the Victorious Battle in the Musan Area.
					
					 They climbed Mt. Paektu, where they hardened their will to glorify for all ages the exploits of the great leaders and accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They visited the Paektusan Secret Camp and held an oath-taking meeting in front of Kim Jong Il's birthplace.
					
					 During the tour they held various political and cultural events like meeting to hear impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas read by them, poem-reciting and sports and amusement games.

articles.title: Method of Brewing Paekhwa Liquor Listed as National Intangible Heritage
articles.content:
Method of Brewing Paekhwa Liquor Listed as National Intangible Heritage
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- A method of brewing Paekhwa (one hundred species of flowers) liquor was listed as one of national intangible heritages in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The liquor is peculiar in look, aroma and taste, as it is ripened with one hundred species of flowers.
					
					 According to the classic book "Tonguibogam (Encyclopedia of Traditional Medicine of Korea)", the Paekhwa liquor is good for longevity.
					
					 It contains vitamin B complex, iron, copper, nickel, manganese and other essential microelements.
					
					 The Paekhwa liquor is popular not only among the Korean people but also foreigners.

articles.title: Minju Joson Calls for Coping with U.S. Imperialists' Ambition for World Domination with Strategy of Unity
articles.content:
Minju Joson Calls for Coping with U.S. Imperialists' Ambition for World Domination with Strategy of Unity
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The Russian paper Vladivostok in an article posted on its website claimed that the Obama Administration of the U.S. has persisted in such high-handed and arbitrary practices as sanctions, pressure and regime change in those countries which are disobedient to it including the DPRK. Such interference in internal affairs will not be halted unless the whole world comes out to check and frustrate such move by its concerted efforts, the article noted.
					 Minju Joson Friday in a commentary says this is relatively a correct analysis of the international political situation which remains turbulent owing to the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices and interference in internal affairs. 
					
					 The U.S., styling itself the "only superpower", has become undisguised in its ambition to dominate the world by force, it notes, adding:
					
					 The U.S. chose independent countries and those countries which are located in strategic vantage points as its main targets in carrying out its hegemonic strategy and has escalated its military intervention, economic sanctions and diplomatic isolation against the said-above countries.
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. military high-handed and arbitrary practices and interference in internal affairs being staged in all parts of the world can hardly be held in check through begging, solicitation and diplomatic negotiations.
					
					 U.S. hegemony is the bottom line of its aggressive foreign policy.
					
					 The U.S. can never overpower the united efforts of the people, however strong it is. The progressives of the world can surely protect the sovereignty of their countries and global peace if all of them get united and launch a dynamic anti-U.S. sacred war to dismember the U.S. imperialists in all parts of the world.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever wage a resolute struggle against the U.S. imperialists' aggression, war and hegemony and boost solidarity with the progressives of the world in their fight for independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Worst Harasser of Peace
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Worst Harasser of Peace
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The Washington Post disclosed that the U.S. exported arms and equipment such as fighters worth billions of dollars to a country in the Mideast not a few quantity of which is cluster bombs.
					 This clearly indicates once again that the U.S. is the spreader of WMDs and enemy of humankind as it disturbs global peace and security, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has raked up profits, while paying lip-service to peace. Lurking behind its arms sale is its intention to bring profits to the munitions monopolies and, at the same time, create imbalance of strength and military standoff in relevant regions and lead them to physical clash and then put them under its control by hurling its forces under the mask of "guardian of peace."
					
					 Seven decades have passed since the end of the Second World War and decades since the demise of the Cold War era, but the danger of war has increased on the earth. This is entirely attributable to the U.S.
					
					 Its massive arms sale sparks off fresh arms race and the danger of war in different countries and regions of the world.
					
					 The U.S. is the hideous war merchant as it has fostered disputes, mass killing and wars in various parts of the world in utter disregard of international law and international organizations.
					
					 It is a mockery and challenge to the global peace for the U.S. to talk about the danger of proliferation of weapons by other countries.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Military Warmongers for Inciting Confrontation with Compatriots
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Military Warmongers for Inciting Confrontation with Compatriots
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Recently brass hats of the south Korean puppet military busied themselves with inspecting hotspot areas including the waters off the five islands in the West Sea and the area along the Military Demarcation Line to "examine combat posture." They cried out for "punishing" someone for "provocation."
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article terms this a desperate bid to escalate tension between the north and the south and instill into the puppet army hostility and confrontation with fellow countrymen and hysteria for a war against the north as part of the treacherous "brain washing."
					
					 Intolerable is confrontation between compatriots, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Out of the aspiration and desire of all Koreans for national unity and reunification, the DPRK has consistently called upon the north and the south to respect each other and open up a new chapter for improving the relations and promoting the movement for national reunification by joining hands with each other as partners for reunification.
					
					 The people from all walks of life in south Korea are also demanding the authorities opt for peaceful co-existence with the north with the compatriotic consciousness while supporting and hailing its efforts for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, detente and peace.
					
					 The south Korean military warmongers are driving soldiers into confrontation with the compatriots in the north while claiming they are "the principal enemy." This is no more than an act of treachery.
					
					 It is none other than traitor Park Geun Hye who is bringing disgrace and death to the south Korean puppet army while training them as hordes of maniacs mad with confrontation and war against the north.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is bound to meet a miserable end before long in the face of the massive resistance of the enraged south Korean people as it is blatantly challenging the sincere efforts of the fellow countrymen for improved inter-Korean relations and national reunification while training the puppet army as war maniacs and group of traitors.

articles.title: Geopolitical Fatalism No Longer Exists on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Geopolitical Fatalism No Longer Exists on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK celebrate July 27 as the eternal war victory day because that day gave origin to the tradition of victory of heroic Korea by frustrating every aggressive scenario of the U.S. counting on its enormous muscle, and heralded the advent of an epoch-making event in which geopolitical fatalism came to an end on the Korean peninsula. Rodong Sinmun Friday says in its commentator's article.
					 The article continues:
					
					 The Korean war in the 1950s was a war of aggression provoked by the U.S. imperialists because of the geopolitical significance of the Korean peninsula in implementing the U.S. strategy for world domination from A to Z.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists massacred Koreans in such a brutal manner as putting the Hitler fascists into the shade. They even used germ and chemical weapons prohibited by international law during the war. Unable to retrieve their setbacks in the war, they threatened to use A-bombs without delay as an ultimatum. 
					
					 The DPRK, however, frustrated the U.S. ultimatum with its ideological and moral superiority and strategic and tactical superiority.
					
					 The DPRK's victory in the war terminated the U.S. imperialists' history of victories in wars as they claimed never sustained any defeat in over 100 wars. It thus dropped the curtain on the geopolitical fatalism which became a maxim in the whole course of human history of wars.
					
					 The DPRK emerged a nuclear power with tremendous capability to protect the sovereignty and peace true to the Workers' Party of Korea's strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 Fatalism on the Korean peninsula which had to fall victim to the scramble of big powers for its geopolitical significance has become a thing of the past.
					
					 The DPRK is capable of striking the U.S. at any time and at any place as the DPRK pleases, keeping the U.S. within the striking range.
					
					 The nuclear weapons which the DPRK inevitably had access to for self-defence not only protect one country and nation but ensure the peace in the region and other parts of the world and happy future of humankind.
					
					 The world will clearly see before long the powerful socialist country in the east achieve a final victory, exercising the right and influence as the master of its destiny and driving force for developing the situation in the region and the world.

articles.title: Struggle against THAAD Deployment Mounts in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against THAAD Deployment Mounts in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Elders of different social circles in south Korea held a news conference at the "National Assembly" on July 27 to denounce the authorities for leaving the destiny of the nation to the tender mercy of outside forces, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 The purpose of deployment of THAAD in south Korea is to carry out the U.S. strategy for holding supremacy in Northeast Asia, the strategy targeting the neighboring countries, they said.
					
					 The situation is reaching the dangerous phase of going back to the past when this land was reduced to shambles of war of foreign forces, they noted, deploring THAAD deployment would result in plugging south Korea into the U.S. missile shield and establishing a new Cold War system whose biggest victim would be the Korean nation.
					
					 The issue of THAAD is not only a matter for Songju County but also the matter of all the people and matter related to peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world, they said, and went on: To reject THAAD deployment is the only way to protect peace.
					
					 We will wage strong actions to check THAAD deployment. We will launch various actions such as demonstration opposing THAAD deployment, all-people signature campaign demanding the retraction of the decision on THAAD deployment and all-people rally.

articles.title: S. Korean Prof. Slams THAAD as Extension of U.S. Missile Shield
articles.content:
S. Korean Prof. Slams THAAD as Extension of U.S. Missile Shield
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore on July 26 carried an article written by Prof. Choe Jong Gon at Yonsei University of south Korea denouncing the authorities for denying the fact that the THAAD deployment is an extension of the U.S. missile defense system.
					 He said the main reason for Japan to welcome the deployment of THAAD by U.S. forces in south Korea is that it is an extension of the U.S. MD.
					
					 Not only China and Russia opposed to THAAD deployment but the U.S. and Japan describes it as an extension of the U.S. missile defense system, but only the Park regime denied it, he said.

articles.title: S. Korean Religious Body Urges Park Geun Hye Regime to Make Apology before People and History
articles.content:
S. Korean Religious Body Urges Park Geun Hye Regime to Make Apology before People and History
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council of Christian Churches called for actions to eliminate the puppet authorities that pursue a treacherous, sycophantic and unpopular rule, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News. 
					 It formed an emergency situation council and held a press conference in Seoul on July 27.
					
					 Speakers there said south Korea is now finding itself in an emergency situation owing to the incompetence and tyranny of the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 Declaring the formation of the emergency situation council, they expressed their will to launch actions in cooperation not only with Christians but also with other religious circles and civic and public organizations.
					
					 Then they issued a declaration on emergency situation titled "Park Geun Hye regime, make an apology before the people and history".
					
					 The declaration urged Park Geun Hye to make an apology before the people and history for her failure in administering state affairs and abnormal acts, abolish the foundation of unpopular state affairs and usher in a new era of democracy and co-existence.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Naval Firing Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Naval Firing Drill
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers staged a large naval firing drill on the islands in the biggest hotspot waters of the West Sea of Korea on Thursday, according to the south Korean Newsis.
					 Involved in the maneuver were artillery pieces, missiles, helicopter gun ships, etc. of the 6th Brigade of Navy of the south Korean puppet army on the Paekryong Island and units on the Yonphyong Island.
					
					 They fired more than 1 500 shells and missiles under the pretence of getting familiar with the order of counteraction with "the north's provocation and surprise infiltration" and "armed conflict" in the West Sea.

articles.title: Exhibition for Dialogue and Reunification Opens in S. Korea
articles.content:
Exhibition for Dialogue and Reunification Opens in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The exhibition on the theme "Let us put an end to evil cycle of confrontation, resume dialogue!" opened at the Seoul City Office on July 27 under the sponsorship of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 Present there were artists, poets, photo writers and other citizens desirous of putting an end to war and separation and concluding a peace treaty on the 63rd anniversary of the Armistice Agreement (AA).
					
					 The organization said that THAAD deployment in south Korea and the conclusion of the south Korea-Japan military treaty would help form the tri-angular military alliance and then south Korea would find itself in the destiny of moving according to the interests of the U.S. and Japan and peace and reunification would be far away.
					
					 The organization said it sponsored a colorful exhibition of pictures and  photos, etc. on the themes of "No THAAD Deployment," "No Japan's Reinvasion" and "For Denuclearization of Korean Peninsula and Conclusion of Peace Treaty" on the anniversary of the conclusion of the AA this year.

articles.title: Actions for Peace Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Peace Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The People's Action for Peace against War of south Korea held a press conference before the U.S. Embassy in Seoul on Wednesday to denounce the U.S. and the puppet authorities for escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula through saber-rattling, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 Pyon Suk Hyon, who lost her husband and one hand in the past Korean war, said that the U.S. forces should stop interfering in the internal affairs of the Korean nation and go back their home at an early date, calling on all Koreans to turn out in the struggle to protect peace on the peninsula.
					
					 A press release was read out at the press conference.
					
					 It noted that the U.S. and the authorities are resorting to their hostile policy toward the north while rejecting dialogue and negotiations with it. It urged them not to insist on their confrontation policy but to opt for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 Demonstrations took place in different areas near the U.S. Embassy in demand of the retraction of the decision on THAAD deployment and the conclusion of a peace treaty.

articles.title: DPRK's War Victory Anniversary Marked in Cuba
articles.content:
DPRK's War Victory Anniversary Marked in Cuba
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- A friendship meeting took place at the Ministry of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba on July 23 on the 63rd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present there were officials of the External Relations Bureau of the Ministry of the Revolutionary Armed Forces, the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The head of the External Relations Bureau of the Ministry of the Revolutionary Armed Forces said:
					
					 I am very pleased to significantly celebrate the anniversary of the war victory together with Korean comrades.
					
					 I warmly congratulate Korean comrades on the anniversary of the war victory.
					
					 The heroic Korean people defeated the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world in the 3-year war under the outstanding leadership of the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 We know well the indomitable will and heroic spirit displayed by the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Today's friendship meeting clearly shows the fraternal friendship and solidarity between Cuba and the DPRK.
					
					 The friendship and solidarity developing day by day under the wise leadership of Comrade Raul Castro Ruz and Comrade Kim Jong Un are true and solid.
					
					 We will make positive efforts to develop the invincible militant friendship and solidarity and cooperation with the army and people of the DPRK onto a higher stage.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Observed in Germany
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Observed in Germany
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting and a film show in Germany on July 23 on the 63rd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and in the month of solidarity with the Korean people.
					 A Korean film dealing with exploits of Marshal Kim Jong Un was shown.
					
					 Present at the meeting were personages of the German branch of the Korean Friendship Association and the German Group for the Study of Korean Culture and masses.
					
					 The organizational secretary of the branch noted in a speech:
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK shattered the myth of the U.S. "mightiness" by defeating the U.S. imperialists in the past Korean war under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung, an iron-willed brilliant commander.
					
					 This was a historic event that instilled great confidence and courage into the peace-loving people struggling for national independence and brought about the beginning of a downhill turn for the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 It is foolish for the U.S. to dare try to bring down the DPRK.
					
					 The history of war victory of the DPRK will be given steady continuity and the DPRK is sure to win the final victory thanks to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Denounce U.S., S. Korean Regime's Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Denounce U.S., S. Korean Regime's Moves against DPRK
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on July 22 in denunciation of the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime against the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Official figures of the White House and the State and Defense Departments of the U.S. are branding the ballistic rocket firing drill conducted by the Hwasong artillery units of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army (KPA) as "violation of resolution" of the UN Security Council and "provocation".
					
					 A real threat to peace and security on the Korean peninsula is not a KPA's legitimate and self-defensive ballistic rocket firing drill, but the U.S. constant arms buildup and nuclear war exercises.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian to be conducted by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces in coming August is a severe threat to peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Park Geun Hye has made over 20 foreign tours since she took power during which she spouted stereo-typed confrontational rhetoric hurting fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 Stooping to any infamy to stifle the compatriots, she decided to deploy U.S. THAAD for aggression in south Korea which her predecessors dared not do.
					
					 We strongly denounce the moves of the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors against the DPRK and fully support its principled stand.

articles.title: National House of Class Education of DPRK Introduced by Czech Organization
articles.content:
National House of Class Education of DPRK Introduced by Czech Organization
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- An article introducing the National House of Class Education was posted by the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association on its internet homepage on July 25.
					 The homepage said:
					
					 A huge crowd of people visit the National House of Class Education which was newly built in Pyongyang.
					
					 The house is indicting the U.S. and Japanese imperialists, the south Korean puppet regime and the class enemies for their viciousness and brutality and inspiring hatred against them.
					
					 The homepage carried photos showing visitors hardening their resolution to take revenge upon the enemies, and exhibits.

articles.title: Acto central por 70o aniversario de ley de igualdad de derechos de hombre y mujer
articles.content:
Acto central por 70o aniversario de ley de igualdad de derechos de hombre y mujer
Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 70o aniversario de la promulgacion de la "ley de igualdad de derechos del hombre y la mujer de Corea de Norte". 
					El 30 de julio del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche, el Presidente Kim Il Sung promulgo esa ley que estipula que las mujeres tienen los mismos derechos que los hombres y pueden participar libremente en todas las esferas de vida social como actividades politicas, vida laboral, educacion, vida cultural, matrimonio y vida familiar. 
					
					Al acto central asistieron Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, la presidenta del Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea, Kim Jong Sun, las funcionarias, heroinas, mujeres que fueron recibidas por los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu, y trabajadoras de los ministerios, organos centrales y la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					El informante dijo que la ley de igualdad de los derechos del hombre y la mujer, elaborada y promulgada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, es el autoctono programa de liberacion de la mujer y del movimiento femenino. 
					
					Gracias a la promulgacion de la ley, las coreanas pudieron impulsar una rueda de la revolucion siendo dignas duenas de la sociedad y ejerciendo los derechos iguales a los del hombre, subrayo y continuo:
					
					Despues de asegurar a las coreanas los autenticos derechos de vida, el gran Lider condujo sabiamente la emancipacion social de ellas. 
					
					En la lucha por cumplir la autoctona causa de liberacion de la mujer, estan impregnadas las imborrables hazanas de la destacada dirigente del movimiento femenino Kang Pan Sok y la heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk. 
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il defendio con firmeza la idea y las proezas de direccion del Presidente sobre la solucion del problema de la mujer y formo a las coreanas como verdaderas revolucionarias de la era del Songun. 
					
					La historia de amor y confianza de los grandes Lideres, que formaron a las mujeres como fuerza poderosa, continua generacion tras generacion bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					En el mundo hay muchos paises y naciones, pero no existen otras mujeres tan felices como las coreanas que viven dignamente con derechos y dignidad de duenas del pais. 
					
					Todas las mujeres deben enaltecer al Presidente y al Dirigente como eternos lideres del Partido y del pueblo coreano y como eterno Sol del Juche y defender con firmeza y glorificar eternamente las imborrables hazanas de ellos que dedicaron todo lo suyo por la dignidad y derechos independientes de la poblacion femenina.

articles.title: RPDC fomenta la proteccion a discapacitados
articles.content:
RPDC fomenta la proteccion a discapacitados
Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ACNC) -- Se activan en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea las labores para ofrecer a los discapacitados las confortables condiciones y ambiente de vida con el patrocinio del Estado.
					Jong Hyon, vicepresidente del Comite Central de la Federacion de Proteccion a Discapacitados de Corea, dijo que en la RPDC se respeta la personalidad de la gente discapacitada y se aseguran legalmente sus derechos e intereses sociopoliticos, y continuo:
					
					En el regimen socialista de nuestro pais, se consolida cada vez mas la base material y tecnica de la proteccion a la poblacion invalida gracias a la politica de amor al pueblo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que se responsabiliza totalmente por el destino y el futuro del pueblo.
					
					Recientemente, fue renovado el contenido de educacion en las escuelas para los discapacitados.
					
					En las escuelas de obreros calificados con discapacidad se ensenan la costura a maquina, el montaje y reparacion de maquina de coser, la elaboracion de madera, el procesamiento de comestibles, la fabricacion de espejuelos, el montaje y experimento de aparatos electronicos, la fabricacion de protesis, etc.
					
					La Escuela de Ciegos de Taedong, la Escuela de Sordomudos de Songchon y otras normalizan y especializan las actividades de grupos artisticos.
					
					Con el objetivo de aumentar la atencion social sobre la proteccion, se realiza la propaganda a traves del periodico, radio y la pagina Web "Hwimang".
					
					Como resultado del incremento de las disciplinas para los discapacitados y la formacion de jugadores prometedores, se lograron notables exitos en los XIV Juegos Paralimpicos y otras competencias internacionales.
					
					Ademas, se realizan activamente el intercambio y cooperacion con las representaciones de organizaciones internacionales y de varios paises, acreditadas en la RPDC.
					
					El 29 de julio es el dia del aniversario 18 de la fundacion de la Federacion de Proteccion a Discapacitados de Corea.
					
					La Asociacion Coreana de Asistencia a los Invalidos, organizada el mismo dia del 87(1998) de la Era Juche como entidad adscrita al Instituto de Poblacion (de aquel entonces) del Ministerio de Salud Publica, cambio su nombre en octubre de 2003 como Asociacion Coreana de Asistencia a los Discapacitados de Corea.
					
					Y desde julio de 2005, se hizo el Comite Central de la Federacion Coreana de Proteccion a Discapacitados.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de primer mercader de guerra del mundo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de primer mercader de guerra del mundo
Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el periodico estadounidense Washington Post transmitio que Estados Unidos exporto recientemente a un pais del Medio Oriente los aviones de combate y otros armamentos valorados en miles de millones de dolares y una parte considerable de ellos fue la bomba de racimo.
					Asi se conocio otra vez que ese pais es proliferante de armas de exterminio masivo y enemigo de la humanidad que destruye la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					Subraya asi Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 29 y continua:
					
					EE.UU. vino actuando con dos caras, o sea, abogar por la paz por delante y ponerla en peligro por detras.
					
					A traves de la venta de armas, quiere enriquecer a los monopolios de industria belica y crear en una region dada el desequilibrio de fuerzas y la confrontacion militar para extenderlos al choque fisico. Asi ocuparia facilmente esa region mediante la intervencion armada justificada con el cartel de la "defensa de paz".
					
					Aunque ya pasaron 70 anos despues del fin de la Segunda Guerra Mundial y decenas de anos desde el fin de la Guerra Fria, no ha llegado la paz al globo terraqueo, por el contrario, se agranda mas el peligro de guerra por culpa de EE.UU.
					
					Su desmesurado negocio de armas genera en varios paises y regiones del mundo nueva carrera armamentista y peligro de guerra.
					
					De veras, el imperio es el primer traficante de guerra que fomenta y agrava por doquier del mundo el litigio, masacre y guerra sin respetar la ley internacional ni las organizaciones internacionales.
					
					A pesar de esto, suele hablar del peligro de proliferacion de armas por otros paises, lo cual es una burla y desafio a la paz mundial.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica fomento de conciencia conflictiva en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica fomento de conciencia conflictiva en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ACNC) -- En estos dias, los caudillos del circulo militar surcoreanos frecuentan las 5 islas del Mar Oeste y la zona de demarcacion militar para la "revision de disposicion combativa" y pronuncian por otra parte unas palabras belicosas como "castigo merecido" a la supuesta "provocacion" de alguien. 
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual de este viernes, lo califica de acto desesperado para agravar la tension entre ambas partes coreanas e infundir en las filas del ejercito titere surcoreano la conciencia conflictiva y el belicismo anti-RPDC como parte de la "educacion mental" de caracter antinacional. 
					
					No se puede permitir nunca que los coreanos consanguineos se peleen entre si, adelanta el articulista y continua:
					
					Partiendo de la aspiracion de toda la nacion a la unidad y reunificacion, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea insiste siempre en que ambas partes coreanas se respeten mutuamente, mejoren las relaciones bilaterales y abran la nueva pagina del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria tomandose de las manos como acompanantes en esta causa nacional. 
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores tambien aplauden los esfuerzos de la RPDC por la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, el alivio de tension y la paz y demandan a las autoridades surcoreanas tomar la decision de coexistir en paz con la parte connacional. 
					
					Sin embargo, los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano instigan a los soldados a la confrontacion fratricida hablando de la "teoria de enemigo principal", lo cual es un crimen antinacional. 
					
					La traidora Park Geun-hye es la culpable principal que impone la verguenza y muerte al ejercito surcoreano convirtiendolo en el colectivo de fanaticos de confrontacion fratricida y guerra de agresion anti-RPDC. 
					
					Park Geun-hye y sus compinches, que desafian a los esfuerzos sinceros de la parte connacional por la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion de la patria, sufriran en un futuro cercano el fin tragico ante la resistencia masiva de la enojada poblacion surcoreana.
